name: Project Maze
detailed_description:
Storage page notice!

Screenshots could be changed due to development process. Not final view.


About the Game

Challenge yourself and beat the labyrinth. Build your own maze or try a randomly generated one.

Features:
  • Randomly generated mazes.
  • Static maze, which generates by number (share this number with your friends and challenge them)
  • Classic mode. (Peaceful passage)
  • Survival mode. (Escape from the enemies)
  • Time attack.
  • Sandbox mode.

  • More multiplayer modes and statistic support in the future.

short_description: Challenge yourself and beat the maze.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x32
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 ~2.0Ghz Duo Processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 540M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 ~3.0Ghz Processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
